items.title: Credit where credit’s due: Inside Experian’s AI framework that’s changing financial access
items.description: Experian's enterprise AI framework offers valuable lessons for businesses seeking to scale beyond proof of concept.

items.title: New approach to agent reliability, AgentSpec, forces agents to follow rules
items.description: Researchers from Singapore Management University developed a new domain-specific language for agents to remain reliable.

items.title: Researchers warn of ‘catastrophic overtraining’ in LLMs
items.description: The researchers compared two versions of OLMo-1b: one pre-trained on 2.3 trillion tokens and another on 3 trillion tokens.

items.title: Hands on with Gemini 2.5 Pro: why it might be the most useful reasoning model yet
items.description: Gemini 2.5 Pro stands out with its massive context window, impressive multimodal reasoning and detailed reasoning chain.

items.title: The TAO of data: How Databricks is optimizing  AI LLM fine-tuning without data labels
items.description: New approach flips the script on enterprise AI adoption by using input data you already have for fine-tuning instead of needing labelled data.
